plot: Heiko suspects that Peter lied to protect Elke. Claudia has to learn that Löpelmann is looking for a new secretary. She is devastated and immediately wants to pack her things. But Löpelmann waves a key. It's the 'Open, Sesame!' for his New York office that will turn Claudia into a thriving agency. She is happy. Peter is interrogated again by the police. The inspector tells him on the head that he lied all the time.
